designations.source: Red List of Fungi for Great Britain: Boletaceae 2013
designations.source_description: Pilot conservation assessment based on national database records, fruit body morphology and DNA barcoding. Authors: A.M. Ainsworth, J.H. Smith, L. Boddy, B.T.M. Dentinger, M. Jordan, D. Parfitt, H.J. Rogers & S.J. Skeates.
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: A taxon is Vulnerable when it is not Critically Endangered or Endangered but is facing a high risk of extinction in the wild in the medium term future.
designations.comments: 2013 assessment based on IUCN Criterion D
